verbose_text: To further determine the ability of the transplanted, liver derived IPCs to respond to a glucose challenge, we performed intraperitoneal glucose tolerance test (IPGTT) and glucose stimulated insulin release assay on the transplanted WB-A cell rats (n = 3) and on positive controls (DM) rats (n = 3) and negative controls (normal) rats (n = 5) after 60 days post-transplantation.
